name: Better Than Sex Cake
author: Guess Who?
instructions: Bake 1 box yellow cake mix as usual. Cook 1 can crushed pine- apple and 1 cup sugar until dissolved. Put on top of cool cake. Add 1 box of vanilla pudding, mix according to directions. Put on top of pineapple. Cool. Add Cool Whip, maraschino cherries, and coconut if desired. Refrigerate overnight.
